attributes.action: Increase pedestrian safety by Blackfriars station
attributes.background: Lack of Pedestrian safety has been an ongoing issue around Blackfriars station. On Wednesday 27th June a serious incident occurred resulting an air ambulance needing to be called.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This appears to be the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
